article.description: Larry Anderson scored 22 points and Casper Ware added 21 as Long Beach State defeated UC Irvine 86-78 on Saturday.
article.headline: Long Beach State pulls out win over UC Irvine
article.linkText: Long Beach State pulls out win over UC Irvine
article.story: LONG BEACH, Calif. -- Larry Anderson scored 22 points and Casper Ware added 21 as Long Beach State defeated UC Irvine 86-78 on Saturday. Both players keyed a 14-2 run during a 4:17 second-half stretch in which the 49ers (9-8, 4-0 Big West) turned a five-point deficit into a 69-62 advantage. Anderson had three baskets and Ware two 3-pointers -- the second gave Long Beach State the lead for good, 63-62, with 9:34 remaining -- during the surge. Darren Moore scored 23 points and Patrick Rembert added 18 for the Anteaters (7-9, 1-2). Eugene Phelps had 13 points and T.J. Robinson 12 points and 14 rebounds for the 49ers.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
